title: There Is No Such Thing as 'Apolitical' Leadership Anymore
description: Eric Pliner, who counsels top CEOs on how to make difficult decisions, says that you won't please everyone but there is a framework to help you make informed, effective decisions.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Eric Pliner, who counsels top CEOs on how to make difficult decisions, says that you won't please everyone but there is a framework to help you make informed, effective decisions.
